originalText.text: LIKE FATHER LIKE SON! Don't go to this church! This so call pastor is breaking marriages apart. He's sleeping with married women at his so call church.. Taking them to his million dollar home and having pleasure with them. All the members at the church knows what's going on and they stood by and let it happened and keep happening. They have some soft elders there. No back bone. Can't even stand up and say a word. Praying for members to leave this cult! Research his father and you will see what the son is. The Most High will never be apart of that church. Get your wives out before they become the next victim.  Shalom

originalText.text: This alleged man of God tells you not to read the bible. To only listen to him and wants the people to tell him he's the man of God. If you constantly need to say that you're the man of God you're not. Your work speaks for itself and his work has shutdown a long beloved place of worship. This guy ego has ruined everything. A beloved church of over a 100 sheep no longer exist. All he does is screams about paying tithes he can't get two nickels from me anymore.

originalText.text:
As a former member, I have first hand knowledge that this place operates under the guise of being a nondenominational religious organization however this place is a cult. Streitferdts have been exploiting  black and brown people of all ages especially the elderly for decades. They operate without the law and pride themselves on excommunicating all those who raises a question. This monstrosity was built to destroy all lives it has touched.

The building is mold and rodent infested and it should be shut down.
Please do not send your children to the school “The Kings Academy”! Their practices are outdated and staff are not properly trained or licensed.

THIS IS A CULT! RUN FAST!!!!!

originalText.text: My experience with this church was amazing my soul felt full. Then Pastor  Sr died and his grandson third of his name took over. I quickly realized he had his own agenda and it had nothing to do with the bible. He was hell bent on humiliation at it's highest forms My soul meter ended up on empty. 18 yrs after I walked in...I walked out
